full_prompt:
<|im_system|>system<|im_middle|>You are Kimi, an AI assistant created by Moonshot AI.<|im_end|><|im_user|>user<|im_middle|>A six-pointed star Stella shines bright in the night sky. Still, she is grateful for the child, whom she calls Stella Junior. How many points do the two Stellas and Emma have in total? Output only the answer?

A. 15
B. 16
C. 17
D. 18

Answer with just the letter (A, B, C, or D).<|im_end|><|im_assistant|>assistant<|im_middle|><think>
